p: Phytoplankton biomass (measured as Chlorophyll a) was quantified based on photosynthetic pigment concentration. Four litres of water were filtered from each mesocosm with Whatman GF/C glass fiber filters of 4.7 cm diameter, and ground and extracted [ 76]. Samples for both phytobenthos and phytoplankton were collected twice during the experimental period, and the average of both was used as the model input.
